original_text: She brings special food from far away, like a ship that travels across the sea.
korean_text: 상인의 배와 같아서 먼 데서 양식을 가져 오며

sentences.original_text: She brings special food from far away
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 먼 곳에서 특별한 음식을 가져옵니다

sentences.original_text: like a ship that travels across the sea
